epic_title: Secure Multi-Factor Authentication and Access Management
title: Implement multi-factor authentication system
description: As a user, I want a multi-factor authentication system to secure my access, so that I can be assured that my account is safe.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The MFA system should support various authentication methods like OTP, passwords, and biometrics. 2. The implementation should ensure secure access and align with industry security standards.
test_cases: Given a user, when they log in, then the system should enforce MFA; Given a user, when they authenticate, then the session should be secure and time out properly.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Design responsive user interface
description: As a user, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can have a seamless experience across all my devices.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface must be consistent across desktop, tablet, and mobile. 2. It should provide an engaging and user-friendly experience.
test_cases: Given any device, when a user accesses the portal, then the user interface must respond and adjust accordingly.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Implement personalized dashboard
description: As a user, I want a personalized dashboard, so that I can easily access relevant banking products and services.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The dashboard should display dynamic content based on the user profile. 2. It should maintain the accessibility and intuitive navigation.
test_cases: Given a user profile, when accessing the dashboard, then relevant products and services should be displayed.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Local Data Management
title: Enable integration with core banking system
description: As a developer, I want to integrate with the core banking system, so that the portal can communicate and synchronize data efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The integration should be secure and performance-optimized. 2. It should maintain synchronization between the portal and core banking systems.
test_cases: Given a request, when data syncs, then it should be seamless and secure; Given a transaction, when an error occurs, then it should be properly handled and logged.

epic_title: Core Banking Integration and Local Data Management
title: Implement optimized local database
description: As a system architect, I want to create a local database, so that I can offload non-critical operations and improve performance.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The local database must be optimized for performance. 2. It should have robust error handling and monitoring mechanisms.
test_cases: Given non-critical data, when offloaded to the local database, then system performance should improve; Given an operation, when an error occurs, then it should be handled and logged.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Develop digital account opening workflows
description: As a customer, I want to open an account online, so that I can complete the process without visiting a branch.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The workflow should have inline validation and progress tracking. 2. It should integrate with backend systems for automated processing.
test_cases: Given account opening, when initiated, then the workflow should track progress and validate input; Given an incomplete application, when revisited, it should auto-save progress.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Workflows
title: Implement service modification request workflows
description: As a customer, I want to request service modifications online, so that I can get my requests processed quickly and efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The workflows should streamline service requests. 2. It should ensure minimal manual intervention and improved processing time.
test_cases: Given service modification, when requested, then the workflow should process it efficiently; Given backend integration, when a request is submitted, it should be processed automatically.

title: Develop document upload module
description: As a customer, I want to upload documents securely, so that my submissions are handled correctly and safely.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The module should support various file formats and ensure secure uploads. 2. It should integrate document tracking and approval workflows.
test_cases: Given a document, when uploaded, then it should be validated and encrypted; Given a submission, when tracked, then its status should be visible and accurate.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notification Mechanism
title: Provide real-time request tracking
description: As a customer, I want to track my requests in real-time, so that I can stay updated on their status.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The tracking system must be real-time and reliable. 2. It should provide consistent communication and notifications.
test_cases: Given a request, when tracked, then its current status should be visible in real-time; Given a status change, when it occurs, a notification should be sent automatically.

epic_title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notification Mechanism
title: Implement notification mechanism
description: As a customer, I want to receive notifications for status changes, so that I am always informed about the progress of my requests.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Notifications should be sent through email and optionally through SMS. 2. The notification mechanism should ensure delivery reliability.
test_cases: Given a status change, when it occurs, then a notification should be sent via email and SMS if opted-in.

epic_title: User Interaction History and Audit Trail
title: Develop user interaction audit trail
description: As a system auditor, I want detailed records of user interactions, so that I can ensure compliance and traceability.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The system must log all user interactions securely. 2. It should ensure that log records are immutable and accessible for audits.
test_cases: Given user interactions, when logged, then the records should be complete and accurate; Given an audit, when conducted, then all necessary records should be available.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As a system administrator, I want to enforce RBAC, so that access to the portal is secure and granular.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The RBAC system must define clear user roles and permissions. 2. It should ensure users can only access data and services within their role.
test_cases: Given a user, when accessing the portal, then their actions must be consistent with their role and permissions; Given an unauthorized access, when attempted, then it should be blocked.

epic_title: Data Security, Privacy, and Compliance Framework
title: Strengthen data security protocols
description: As a compliance officer, I want to enforce strong data security measures, so that the system complies with financial regulations.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The framework must include encryption, intrusion detection, and monitoring. 2. It should ensure compliance with GDPR, PCI DSS, and other regulations.
test_cases: Given data handling, when performed, then it must be encrypted and secure; Given a security incident, when detected, it should trigger appropriate response workflows.
